description:
After the first day of training, there is only one player left in the baseball ground! Kurokan decides to bring them back for training in order to get rid of the kids` cowardliness.
Under the motivation of Kurokan, they are all back on the field and finally have a decent practicing area. Kurokan brings back the enthusiastic life of baseball to WashinomoriÔºÅ
Source: crunchyroll
